questions.question_text: Which statement regarding the GoldenGate Data Pump is incorrect?

discussion.content:
Data Pump has distance limitations is wrong, but Data Pump is a separate process is worse.
A is the correct answer
I think the answer is C. Datapump is a separate OGG process.

choices.B: Data Pump can be used to pump trail records to multiple locations.
choices.D: Data Pump uses TCP/IP to route the trail records.
choices.A: Data Pump is a separate process.

questions.question_text: Identify two correct statements regarding GoldenGate supported features.

discussion.content: A and C are the correct answers

choices.D: GoldenGate for SQLServer supports only SQLServer Standard Edition as a source.
choices.C: GoldenGate for Oracle supports Exadata Hybrid Columnar Compression as a source.
choices.B: GoldenGate supports DML and DDL replication for all supported databases.
choices.A: GoldenGate supports network encryption and compression.

questions.question_text:
You must configure GoldenGate parameter files for conflict resolution and want to be sure that the before values are compared with current values in the target database to detect update and delete conflicts.
How should you accomplish this?

choices.A: Use the COMPCOLS with the GETUPDATEBEFORES option of the MAP parameter in the Replicat parameter file to specify columns that are to be used with before values in the Replicat WHERE clause.
choices.C: Use the GETUPDATEBEFORES option of the MAP parameter in the Replicat parameter file to specify columns that are to be used with before values in the Replicat WHERE clause.
choices.D: Use the GETBEFORECOLS option of the MAP parameter in the Replicat parameter file to specify columns that are to be used with before values in the Replicat clause. WHERE
choices.B: Use the COMPARECOLS option of the MAP parameter in the Replicat parameter file to specify columns that are to be used with before values in the Replicat WHERE

questions.question_text: You must synchronize tables with Large Object data types. Which Initial Load method supports this process?

discussion.content: According to the Oracle OGG Fundamentals course, File to replicat supports LONG and LOB column replication.
A looks to be the answer
I think both B and D are right, but we must select only one...

questions.question_text:
You are implementing GoldenGate monitoring via the Enterprise Manager Plug-In. When you start JAgent, it fails with "ajava.lang.Exception: One or more Java
Agent properties in Config.properties are not defined properly".
What is the first thing to check?

choices.A: if The Enterprise Manager Agent is running
choices.B: if the JAgent has been enabled in the GoldenGate Manager
choices.D: if the Oracle Wallet has been created for the JAgent
choices.C: if the agent type is set to OEM in JAgent properties
